UserPrioritizedRecord.name: UserPrioritizedRecord
UserPrioritizedRecord.description: Represents records that Pipeline Inspection, Account Intelligence, Contact Intelligence, and Lead Intelligence users flag as important for tracking in pipeline and intelligence views and filters.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who marked this record as important.

TargetId.description: The ID of the target object that is marked as important. Supported objects include:

TargetKeyPrefix.description: The key prefix of the target object that is marked as important.
